body:
Hey, whats up. Some of you might not know me or like me, but i'm leaving avicus. I don't know for how long, but it was a pleasure to be here. And after a failed season with PPB ( or Apollo rn ), i don't see any light for me to stay. ( I might check forums once a while )

I'd like to thank a few:

Grape: Being such a great friend and awesome senior mod and and chill to talk to!

Jiveh: Being an awesome mate, friend and it's been fun to play with you.

Robin: Awesome leader, noticed me to BC i'd love to thank you for that.

Eric: Thank you for these moments friendd, i love how you could combo me so hard :p, i'm going to miss ya.

BC and PPB, and Kaldorei for the short stay

Cya! o/

Oh and to Javi since he introduced me to this network!

title: Good bye, leaving Avicus.
